title: Polls, heatwave hit loan collections in Q1, asset quality declines
description: Indian lenders such as HDFC Bank, Kotak Mahindra Bank, RBL Bank, and Union Bank of India are experiencing a decline in asset quality, with increases in fresh slippages and gross NPAs. Factors like a heatwave, elections, and seasonal issues are contributing to the challenges faced by these financial institutions.
